leader.body: All's well that ends better.
Be the chief but never the lord.
The key to success is action.
Leadership starts at the top.
Leadership is solving problems.
Your success and happiness lie in you.
Saying nothing sometimes says the most.
Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
The road to success is always under construction..
Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
Success comes to those who become success conscious.
Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.
He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader.
Life is a series of choices and all we can do is make them.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
Success is about doing the right thing, not about doing everything right.
Leaders think and talk about solutions. Followers think and talk about the problems.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Leaders spend 5% of their time on the problem & 95% of their time on the solution. Get over it & crush it!
Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
Great leaders are almost always great simplifiers, who can cut through argument, debate and doubt, to offer a solution everybody can understand.

player.body: You build on failure.
The key to success is action.
Learn from the mistakes of others.
Failure is the highway to success.
Play by the rules, but be ferocious.
Saying nothing sometimes says the most.
Fate is in your hands and no one elses.
The future depends on what you do today.
The first principle of success is desire.
Do not regret the past. Look to the future.
People who avoid failure also avoid success.
When you make a choice, you change the future.
The road to success is always under construction..
To appreciate the sun, you gotta know what rain is.
Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Fear is what stops you. Courage is what keeps you going.
Life is a series of choices and all we can do is make them.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Life is not meant to be easy my child, but take courage: it can be delightful.
Many roads lead to the path, but basically there are only two: reason and practice.
You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Itâ€™s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.
Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
